library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)

co2 = read_csv("data/unrate.csv") %>% filter(year < 1970) %>% mutate(tyear = year*3) %>%
  mutate(attempt_linkSTART = paste("<a href=\"", links, "\">",attempt,"</a>",sep="")) %>%
  mutate(attempt_link = paste(links, ">",attempt,sep=""))
ojs_define(co2data = co2)
